\documentclass[twoside,12pt]{book}

\ifnum\enablePageHeader>0

\usepackage[
  papersize={8.5in,11in},
  layout=letterpaper,
  right=1.0in,
  left=1.0in,
  top=6\baselineskip,
  bottom=5\baselineskip,
  heightrounded,
]{geometry}

\else

\usepackage[
  papersize={8.5in,11in},
  layout=letterpaper,
  right=1.0in,
  left=1.0in,
  top=4\baselineskip,
  bottom=4\baselineskip,
  heightrounded,
]{geometry}

\fi

% Page border %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{eso-pic}
\usetikzlibrary{calc}
\usetikzlibrary{decorations.pathmorphing}
\AddToShipoutPictureBG{
  \ifnum\enablePageBorder>0
  \ifnum\value{page}>\pageBorderBegin % page to begin drawing border
  \begin{tikzpicture}[overlay,remember picture]
  \draw [line width=3pt]
    ($ (current page.north west) + (0.8in,-0.6in) $)
    rectangle
    ($ (current page.south east) + (-0.8in,0.6in) $);
  \draw [line width=1pt]
    ($ (current page.north west) + (0.85in,-0.65in) $)
    rectangle
    ($ (current page.south east) + (-0.85in,0.65in) $); 
  \end{tikzpicture}%
  \fi
  \fi
}

% Format %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\newcommand{\fmtBoldWideText}{\bfseries\normalsize\addfontfeature{LetterSpace=5.0}\fontdimen2\font=0.5em}

\newcommand{\fmtItalicWideText}{\itshape\normalsize\addfontfeature{LetterSpace=5.0}\fontdimen2\font=0.5em}

\newcommand{\fmtFirstLetter}{\huge}

\newcommand{\fmtPrayerRepeatText}{\itshape\footnotesize\addfontfeature{LetterSpace=10.0}\fontdimen2\font=1.0em}

\newcommand{\fmtPrayerSubtitle}{\itshape\footnotesize\addfontfeature{LetterSpace=5.0}\fontdimen2\font=0.5em}

\newcommand{\fmtPrayerTitle}{\bfseries\normalsize\addfontfeature{LetterSpace=5.0}\fontdimen2\font=0.5em}

% Commands %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\newcommand{\brPrinter}{\\\hspace*{1.5em}}
\newcommand{\brUSTrade}{}

\newcommand{\defaultFontSize}{\large}

\newcommand{\vspaceSmall}{\vspace*{.5\baselineskip}}
\newcommand{\vspaceMedium}{\vspace*{1.0\baselineskip}}
\newcommand{\vspaceLarge}{\vspace*{1.5\baselineskip}}

\newcommand{\titleMajor}[1]{%
  \hfill
  {\bfseries\addfontfeature{LetterSpace=15.0}\fontdimen2\font=1.2em\uppercase{#1}}
  \hfill
}

\newcommand{\titleMinor}[1]{%
  \hfill
  {\addfontfeature{LetterSpace=10.0}\fontdimen2\font=0.8em\textsc{#1}}
  \hfill
}
